もんですか: (もんですか) - used to create a rhetorical question indicating that the speaker actually believes the opposite is true; emphasizes a determination not to do something by means of a rhetorical question
もんどり打つ: (もんどりうつ) - to turn a somersault
も一つ: (もひとつ) - furthermore; adding to the above-mentioned
も然ることながら: (もさることながら) - one may well say so, but ...; even more than
も然る事ながら: (もさることながら) - one may well say so, but ...; even more than
も然る事乍ら: (もさることながら) - one may well say so, but ...; even more than
やあらへん: (やあれへん) - is not; am not; are not
やあれへん: (やあれへん) - is not; am not; are not
やい: (ヤーイ) - (used when calling out to someone, somewhat aggressive)  hey; hey you
やいのやいの: (やいのやいの) - (pressing) hard; badgeringly; pesteringly; repeatedly; urgingly
やえやま型掃海艦: (やえやまがたそうかいかん) - Yaeyama class minesweeper
やおい: (ヤオイ) - (from ヤマなし、オチなし、意味なし. Sometimes 矢追.) manga on the theme of male homosexual love
やか: (やか) - (after a noun, adjective stem, onomatopoeic-mimetic word, etc.) seeming very ...
やがる: (やがる) - (after the -te form or -masu stem of a verb) verb suffix indicating hatred and contempt, or disdain for another's action
やきもちを妬く: (やきもちをやく) - to be jealous
やきもちを焼く: (やきもちをやく) - to be jealous
やくざ: (ヤクザ) - (possibly from 八九三) professional gambler or ruffian (esp. a member of the Japanese mafia)/yakuza (member); uselessness/purposelessness
やくに立たない: (やくにたたない) - of no avail; useless
やけに: (やけに) - (from 自棄)  awfully; frightfully; desperately; violently; unduly; extremely
やけを起こす: (やけをおこす) - to become desperate; to give way to despair
やけ酒: (やけざけ) - drowning one's cares in drink; drinking in desperation
やけ食い: (やけぐい) - binge eating; stress eating
やさぐれる: (やさぐれる) - to sulk/to be peevish; (orig. meaning) to run away from home
やさんす: (やしゃます) - (after a monosyllable imperfective form verb) indicates respect for the one performing an action and politeness to the listener
やしない: (やしない) - (や is from は and しない is negative of する) (usu. used after -masu stem of verb) emphatic negative (verb)
やしゃます: (やしゃます) - (after a monosyllable imperfective form verb) indicates respect for the one performing an action and politeness to the listener
やしゃんす: (やしゃます) - (after a monosyllable imperfective form verb) indicates respect for the one performing an action and politeness to the listener
やせても枯れても: (やせてもかれても) - even though one has fallen on hard times; however down on one's luck one may be
やせの大食い: (やせのおおぐい) - thin person who eats a lot; big eater who stays thin
やせ型: (やせがた) - slender build/slender figure/leptosome/leptosomatic habit; waifish/leptosomaic/leptosomatic/ectomorphic
やせ形: (やせがた) - slender build/slender figure/leptosome/leptosomatic habit; waifish/leptosomaic/leptosomatic/ectomorphic
やせ我慢: (やせがまん) - fake stoicism; pretended endurance (for sake of pride); false courage
やせ細る: (やせほそる) - to lose weight; to become thin; to wither away
やせ過ぎ: (やせすぎ) - being too thin; being underweight
やだ: (やだ) - not a chance/not likely/no way; fault/defect/weak point
やっかむ: (やっかむ) - to be jealous; to be envious
やっさもっさ: (やっさもっさ) - hurly-burly; helter-skelter; hustle and bustle; turmoil
やった: (やったー) - hooray; whee; hot dog!; you beaut; whacko; yowzer!; whoopee!; yes!
やったら: (やったら) - if that's the case
やったー: (やったー) - hooray; whee; hot dog!; you beaut; whacko; yowzer!; whoopee!; yes!
やっちまう: (やっちまう) - (from 遣って + しまう) to do (esp. something one regrets)
やっちゃう: (やっちゃう) - (from やって and しまう)  to have (esp. sex, food, etc.)
やっつけ仕事: (yattsukeshigoto) - trabalho apressado, trabalho malfeito, trabalho feito às pressas
やってもうた: (やってもーた) - oops!; I did it again; now I've done it; I've messed up
やってもた: (やってもーた) - oops!; I did it again; now I've done it; I've messed up
やってもーた: (やってもーた) - oops!; I did it again; now I've done it; I've messed up
やって来る: (やってくる) - to come along/to come around/to turn up; to arrive at the present/to get where one is/to have been doing something (for a period of time)
やって行く: (やっていく) - to live; to make a living; to get on with
やって見る: (やってみる) - to have a go; to try and do (something); to take a chance with something
やっと: (やっと) - at last/at length; barely/narrowly/just/by the skin of one's teeth
やっとか目: (やっとかめ) - (Nagoya (and surrounding areas) dialect)  a long time (since the last time); it's been a while (since I last saw, mailed, etc., you)
やっとこ: (やっとこ) - at last/at length; barely/just/by the skin of one's teeth; (やっとこさ, やっとこせ only)  yo-ho!/heave-ho!
やっとこさ: (やっとこ) - at last/at length; barely/just/by the skin of one's teeth; (やっとこさ, やっとこせ only)  yo-ho!/heave-ho!
やっとこせ: (やっとこ) - at last/at length; barely/just/by the skin of one's teeth; (やっとこさ, やっとこせ only)  yo-ho!/heave-ho!
やっとの事で: (やっとのことで) - just managing; with great difficulty
やっとの思いで: (やっとのおもいで) - finally; after great pains; at last; just barely
やっぱ: (やっぱ) - too/also/likewise/either; still/as before; even so/either way/nonetheless/in any event/all the same; as expected
やっ付ける: (やっつける) - to beat; to attack (an enemy); to do away with; to finish off
やな明後日: (やなあさって) - three days from today; four days from today
やねん: (やねん) - it is assuredly that ...; can say with confidence that ...
やの明後日: (やのあさって) - three days from today; four days from today
やぶ蛇: (やぶへび) - unnecessary trouble brought upon oneself; stirring up a hornet's nest
やまびこ: (yamabiko) - pula a maioria das estações Linha Tōhoku Shinkansen
やみ屋: (やみや) - black marketeer; black market trader
やむを得ず: (yamuwoezu) - inevitavelmente, de forma inevitável, necessariamente, relutantemente, contra a vontade de alguém
やむを得ない: (yamuwoenai) - não há o que fazer, inevitável
やむ得ず: (やむえず) - unavoidably; inevitably; necessarily; reluctantly; against one's will
やむ方なし: (やむかたなし) - it cannot be helped; there is no other way
やむ終えない: (やむおえない) - (incorrect variant of やむを得ない)  cannot be helped; unavoidable
やむ負えない: (やむおえない) - (incorrect variant of やむを得ない)  cannot be helped; unavoidable
やめ検: (やめけん) - former public prosecutor who now works as a lawyer; retired public prosecutor
やめ検弁護士: (やめけんべんごし) - former public prosecutor who now works as a lawyer; prosecutor-turned-lawyer
やもう得ない: (やもうえない) - (incorrect variant of やむを得ない)  cannot be helped; unavoidable
やもめ暮らし: (やもめぐらし) - widowhood; widowerhood; viduity
やも知れぬ: (やもしれぬ) - may; might; perhaps; may be; possibly
やや: (やや) - Oh!; Oh my!; Dear me!
ややあって: (ややあって) - after a little while; presently
やや小さい: (ややちいさい) - (ant: やや大きい) smallish; on the small side
やら: (やら) - denotes uncertainty; (as ＡやらＢやら...) such things as A and B/A and B and so on/A and B and the like/A and B and whatnot
